trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SEQ_00<tab>Bol Wuruq is eager to hear how you have been getting on.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SEQ_01<tab>With Tuliyollal enjoying a period of relative peace, the attendant at the For'ard Cabins suggests you treat yourself to a plate of tacos at the nearby Xbalyav Ty'e. Br'uk Evu's cooking is said to be second to none, and his tavern likely has an open seat with your name on it.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SEQ_02<tab>Br'uk Evu greets you with his characteristic hospitality and accepts your order. You find a table to sit at while your food is being prepared.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SEQ_03<tab>As you get ready to enjoy your meal, you overhear a conversation between a father and his son, the latter who is struggling to adapt to life in the capital after thirty years in Alexandria. Just as the pair resolve to tackle this problem as a family, Wuk Lamat approaches to offer advice. Their situation is a common one, it seems, for she tells them about a group established to help impart the skills required for life outside the dome to returning Turali. Content with having helped her subjects, the Vow of Resolve leaves their table and finally notices you sitting nearby. After a bit of catching up, she mentions that she and Koana have something to discuss with you at the palace. Curious as to what the Dawnservants might want, you agree to attend them.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SEQ_04<tab>You arrive at Sunperch, but the gatekeeper informs you that Koana is busy with pressing matters. He bids you wait inside until the Vow of Reason returns.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SEQ_05<tab>Upon entering the throne room, you see several of the former Scions waiting as well. You briefly exchange news on your respective affairs before Koana enters the chamber and explains the reason for the summons: a funeral for Queen Sphene is to be held in Alexandria, and he asks if those present wish to attend. For personal and political reasons, Wuk Lamat decides to pay her respects as a representative of Tuliyollal and requests that you and your allies come along to keep watch over proceedings. With your course of action decided, you are to depart to Solution Nine, where Gulool Ja and Oblivion are making final preparations for the ceremony.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SEQ_06<tab>Gulool Ja is thankful that everyone could attend the funeral, which was planned with the aid of recently recovered historical records. These records indicate that flowers were once placed as offerings to deceased Alexandrians, and so flowers are being distributed to all the attendees. The young king likely knows where to receive them.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Br'uk Evu.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_TODO_01<tab>Find a table somewhere in Xbalyav Ty'e.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Landsguard gatekeeper.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the Landsguard gatekeeper.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Gulool Ja in the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BOLWURUQ_000_001<tab>Ah, it is a pleasure as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Have you been able to relax lately?

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BOLWURUQ_100_008<tab>Wonderful. As busy as you have been, with the rite of succession among other things, you deserve an opportunity to experience Tuliyollal at a more leisurely pace.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BOLWURUQ_000_009<tab>Sampling the tacos at Xbalyav Ty'e is one such way to do so. They're made the traditional way and laden with fillings, and are absolutely sublime! If you have an empty stomach, the owner, Br'uk Evu, will look after you!
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BOLWURUQ_000_010<tab>Ahhh, talking about the tacos at Xbalyav Ty'e has given me a craving... If you have time and an empty stomach, do go and have some for me!
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BRUKEVU_000_100<tab>Well, if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Alone today, are you?
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BRUKEVU_000_101<tab>I see, I see. If you have a hankering for tacos, then they're on the house. Consider it thanks for everything you've done for Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BRUKEVU_000_102<tab>I see, I see. If you have a hankering for tacos, then they're on the house. Consider it a token of gratitude for your help tracking down those treasures.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BRUKEVU_000_103<tab>I see, I see. If you have a hankering for tacos, then they're on the house. Consider it thanks for bringing down the Passage of the Unbound.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BRUKEVU_000_107<tab>Go ahead and find a table. I'll bring you your meal as soon as it's ready.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_BRUKEVU_000_110<tab>Your red-haired friend has become something of a regular. Rare is the day he won't take one with him on a morning stroll.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244A_000_200<tab>(-Gregarious Man-)You still love tacos, I hope? Heh, you ate so many when you turned five, you could barely move afterwards. Remember that?
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244B_000_201<tab>No, not really. That was thirty years ago for me...

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244A_000_202<tab>Right... Sorry, it's still strange for me too. Just the other day you were a little boy, clinging to your mother's skirt as you set off for Yyasulani...and now you're a man grown with a face full of hair.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244A_000_203<tab>Even so, I knew you were my son the instant I saw you. We're still family, and you can always rely on me.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244B_000_204<tab>Relying... That feels like the only thing I'm doing right now. On you and everyone else. I can't even start a fire without assistance at my new job...
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244B_000_205<tab>Back in Alexandria, we had electrope. If I needed fire, all I had to do was press a button. Everything was at our fingertips.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244B_000_206<tab>But here, I'm helpless. A culinarian who can't even light the stove. The way the others in the kitchen stared at me... Gods, I'd never felt so embarrassed.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244A_000_207<tab>I'm sorry to hear that... I'd been told the tales, but it seems life is really different within the dome.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244B_000_208<tab>My wife and children─I was thinking I'd have them join me once things had settled, but at this rate...
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244A_100_208<tab>I say you send for them. If they're your family, then they're mine too. I'll do whatever's necessary to make it work.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_209<tab>I didn't mean to overhear, but it seems you're having trouble readjusting to life in Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244B_000_210<tab>V-Vow Wuk Lamat!?
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_211<tab>To aid folk like yourself, we've established a support group at the Wing of Reflection. There, you can learn the skills you need to live outside the dome.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_212<tab>It isn't easy being back, I know. But I'm hopeful that they can make things easier.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_MAN05244B_000_213<tab>That's exactly what I need! I'll definitely seek this group out─and I'll bring my family with me! Thank you!
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_214<tab>Oh, look who it is! I was just about to go and find you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_100_214<tab>You don't mind the company, I hope? I could use a bite to eat myself.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_215<tab>Ahhh, the tacos here never disappoint!
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_216<tab>So, what've you been up to lately?
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_A3_000_001<tab>I've been exploring Tural with my trusty alpaca.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_A3_000_002<tab>I've been catching up on sleep.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_A3_000_003<tab>I've been helping out around Wachumeqimeqi.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_A3_000_004<tab>I've been working to recover some stolen artifacts.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_A3_000_005<tab>I've been making a name for myself at the Arcadion.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_218<tab>Hehe, I'm glad that the spitting devil is serving you well, and you're still enjoying seeing the sights.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_100_218<tab>Given everything we've been through, I don't blame you. But once you've had your fill, I'm sure you'll be itching to get back into the thick of things.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_200_218<tab>I've heard stories about someone helping out the businesses. Seeing how well they're faring now, you've clearly done a fine job.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_300_218<tab>I've been reviewing reports from the Landsguard. Given my responsibilities, I'm not in a position to chase criminals abroad, so I needed someone else to take care of the matter. I'm glad that someone is you!
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_400_218<tab>You're fighting in the arena in Alexandria!? By facing off against tough opponents, I'd wager you've honed your skills even further!
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_219<tab>As for myself, I'm being kept busy with duties at the palace. But whenever I find a moment, I like to walk the streets and talk to the people.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_220<tab>That way, I can better understand the problems they have, and share them with Koana to figure out solutions.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_221<tab>I was on one such walk just now. And as I mentioned, I was hoping to find you.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_222<tab>Koana and I have something we want to discuss with you─as Dawnservants. Do you have time to come to the palace?
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_223<tab>Great. I'll go on ahead. Please come and join us once you've finished here.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_250<tab>It seems Koana's gone somewhere. Sorry...

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SUNPERCHGATEKEEPER_000_300<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it is always an honor. Vow Koana has stepped away to attend to a pressing matter, but he should join you within before long.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SYSTEM_000_301<tab>Enter Sunperch?
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_400<tab>Oh, you're all here, too?
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_ALISAIE_000_401<tab>Vow Koana summoned us. Though if truth be told, Alphinaud and I have been seeing him quite regularly of late.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_ALPHINAUD_000_402<tab>He asked us to share our knowledge of Hannish culture, you see, in hopes of further strengthening your alliance. We were of course happy to oblige him.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_GRAHATIA_000_403<tab>Krile and I were likewise summoned. Otherwise we've been carrying on with our work, compiling information on the golden city.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KRILE_000_404<tab>My grandfather embarked on his investigation twenty years ago. With our report, we shall finish what he started.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_ALISAIE_000_405<tab>Lest you wonder, Thancred and Urianger have left to resume their tour of Tural.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_ALISAIE_000_406<tab>Y'shtola, meanwhile, is back to researching cross-rift travel. She was here just a few days ago to get Koana's permission to investigate Living Memory.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_ALISAIE_000_407<tab>By the way, she mentioned wanting to take a look at the key in your keeping at some point.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_ALISAIE_000_408<tab>If the look she had in her eyes was any indication, I suggest you brace yourself for when she comes calling. You're like to be stuck with her for a while.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_ALPHINAUD_000_409<tab>As for Estinien...we know neither where he is nor what he is doing. Some things never change.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_410<tab>My apologies for the delay.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KRILE_000_411<tab>Think nothing of it. We took advantage of the time to catch up.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_ALISAIE_000_412<tab>So, what can we do for you? Hopefully present company is enough for whatever it is you need.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_413<tab>The matter for which I have summoned you pertains to Alexandria.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_414<tab>A state funeral will soon be held in Solution Nine to mourn the passing of Queen Sphene. King Gulool Ja and his administration have invited us to attend.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_415<tab>While certain issues remain unresolved between our nations, such as the treatment of Yyasulani, I see no reason not to attend.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_GRAHATIA_000_416<tab>For generations, the Alexandrians lived without even the awareness of death. I wouldn't have expected them to have funeral rites still.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_417<tab>Apparently, the members of Oblivion unearthed records of ceremonies that were conducted in the Alexandria of old. It was they who put forth the proposal that the queen be thus honored.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_418<tab>Leave it to that lot to think of such things.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_419<tab>The people of Alexandria no longer forget the departed. They're being confronted with the idea of death for the first time. I suspect our friends wanted to do something for them.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KRILE_000_420<tab>Though Sphene was but a simulacrum, she was nonetheless a pillar for her people. The pain of her passing must run deep.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_421<tab>Indeed. A funeral will give Alexandrians the chance to come together to express their grief, that they might overcome it.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_422<tab>I wasn't sure at first, but I've decided to go. Not only to be there for Gulool Ja, but to put this chapter behind us.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_423<tab>That I requested your presence was none other than to see if you wish to attend the funeral. You knew Sphene as well, after all...
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_A1_000_001<tab>I think I should go too.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_A1_000_002<tab>Sometimes I wonder if there wasn't another way...
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_A1_000_003<tab>That would be inappropriate.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_425<tab>Because you consider yourself responsible for her demise, I take it. But that's not a burden you bear alone.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_426<tab>Here's my idea. As Vow, I'll attend the funeral as a representative of Tuliyollal. Meanwhile, you can go in a personal capacity, and watch over the people as they mourn.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_427<tab>You and me both. But we made our choices and are responsible for what comes of them. As Vow, I'll attend the funeral in an official capacity. I owe it to the Alexandrian people to bear witness to their grief.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_428<tab>I'd like it if you could be there to watch over everything, like you did all through the rite of succession.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_429<tab>Because of your role in her demise, I take it. But we had no choice. We had to stop her from killing countless innocents.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_430<tab>I won't force you to attend the funeral if it makes you feel uncomfortable. But while I represent Tuliyollal in an official capacity, I'd like it if you could be there to watch over everything.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KRILE_000_431<tab>I feel the rest of us should go too. Regardless of the reason, the fact remains that we deprived Alexandria of a beloved ruler.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KRILE_000_432<tab>It's only right that we remember who Sphene was, to her people and to others, so let us stand with you.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_433<tab>Then it's decided. Let's head to Solution Nine and look for Gulool Ja in the Backroom.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_435<tab>Though I too would ideally attend the funeral, given the circumstances, I think it is best that Lamaty'i represents us.

TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_440<tab>Besides, I need to be on hand to oversee the city's repairs, which is taking longer than expected. When that work is complete, we will finally look into installing new thrones.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KOANA_000_445<tab>But to have Father's throne here still... It makes me feel he is close by. I'm quite happy for it to remain for a while.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_GEODE_000_450<tab>It's good of you to come. We're expecting a large attendance for the funeral─the venue isn't like to hold everyone at once.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_GEODE_000_455<tab>But the altar will remain for those who couldn't be present during the ceremony. We ourselves plan to go and pay our respects afterwards.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SHALE_000_460<tab>Glad to see the invitation reached you. As you may have heard, we were able to find data on forgotten funeral customs amidst old records.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SHALE_000_465<tab>It appears to have been preserved by those who rued the loss of culture due to the proliferation of regulators. We're grateful for their foresight.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_GULOOLJA_000_500<tab>Ah, you came for the funeral!
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_501<tab>Of course. I'm the only one who'll officially take part, though. The others will watch over the proceedings.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_502<tab>So, how have you been? It's been a while since my last visit.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_GULOOLJA_000_503<tab>I'm good. Shale is always teaching me new things.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_GULOOLJA_000_504<tab>Recently, I've learned about Everkeep's systems and the mechanical soldiers. It's knowledge I'll need to use my authority properly.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_WUKLAMAT_000_505<tab>Studious as always, I see. By way of a treat, I've brought you gateau au chocolat. It's a kind of cake. I think you'll like it.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_GULOOLJA_000_506<tab>Thank you, Lamaty'i. And thank you for coming. I've never been to a funeral before, so I feel less nervous having you here.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_ALISAIE_000_507<tab>Out of curiosity, what's the custom in Alexandria? In our world, it's common to offer flowers to the departed.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_SHALE_000_508<tab>It's much the same here according to the records. Flowers will be distributed to all attendees.
TEXT_KINGMG101_05244_KRILE_000_509<tab>Considering that all the worlds used to be one, the practice of offering flowers may well share the same ancient origin. Fascinating, wouldn't you say?
